The image shared on Facebook shows that: 8 percent of the poll's respondents favored Subianto and his running mate Sandiaga Uno after the ex-general delivered a speech.
The image includes the logo of Saiful Mu: SMRC), a pollster, above the candidates' faces.
The caption of the post translates to: These are the results of a survey conducted after Prabowo-Sandi's nationalistic speech last night," referring to Subianto's campaign speech on January 14.
The executive director of SMRC: Djayadi Hanan, denied that his firm conducted any survey with the reported results and stated that the Facebook post irresponsibly used SMRC's name.
